thread.section_title: Entertainment News, Headlines and Video - CBS News
thread.title: ​Elton John will release 33rd studio album next year
thread.title_full: ​Elton John will release 33rd studio album next year - CBS News

author: CBS/AP
title: ​Elton John will release 33rd studio album next year
text:
Elton John is still standing - and will release his 33rd studio album next year.
John's publicists announced Thursday that "Wonderful Crazy Night" is set for release on Island Records on Feb. 5. The first single, "Looking Up," is out on Friday.
Play Video Entertainment Elton John AIDS Foundation gala brings out the stars Hillary Clinton was honored at the Elton John AIDS Foundation's 2013 Enduring Vision benefit ball in New York. Elton John and husband David Furni...
"Wonderful Crazy Night" is co-produced by John and T Bone Burnett, who worked on the piano-playing star's rootsy, well-received 2013 release "The Diving Board."
Lyrics are by Bernie Taupin, John's songwriting partner of almost five decades.
The debut single, "Looking Up," will be out on Oct. 23. Go here for pre-order details.
John, 68, is one of Britain's most enduringly successful musicians, and a campaigner for gay rights around the world. He was knighted by Queen Elizabeth II in 1998 for his contributions to pop music and to the fight against AIDS.
